# css-z-index

Single purpose CSS utility classes for z-index.

## Install

```
npm install css-z-index
```

## Usage

Add the stylesheet to your HTML:

```html
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/css-z-index/dist/css-z-index.min.css">
```

Or import in CSS:

```css
@import "css-z-index";
```

## API

11 z-index values on a simple numeric scale from `.z1` to `.z11`.

| Class | z-index value    |
|-------|------------------|
| .z1   | 1                |
| .z2   | 100              |
| .z3   | 200              |
| .z4   | 300              |
| .z5   | 400              |
| .z6   | 500              |
| .z7   | 600              |
| .z8   | 700              |
| .z9   | 800              |
| .z10  | 900              |
| .z11  | 2147483647 (max) |

## Responsive Suffixes

Every class has responsive variants activated at three breakpoints. Append the suffix to any class name.

| Suffix | Breakpoint       | Example   | Meaning                                  |
|--------|------------------|-----------|------------------------------------------|
| -s     | min-width: 32em  | .z5-s     | z-index: 400 at 32em and above           |
| -m     | min-width: 48em  | .z5-m     | z-index: 400 at 48em and above           |
| -l     | min-width: 96em  | .z5-l     | z-index: 400 at 96em and above           |

## Complete Class List

Base classes: .z1, .z2, .z3, .z4, .z5, .z6, .z7, .z8, .z9, .z10, .z11
Small (-s):   .z1-s, .z2-s, .z3-s, .z4-s, .z5-s, .z6-s, .z7-s, .z8-s, .z9-s, .z10-s, .z11-s
Medium (-m):  .z1-m, .z2-m, .z3-m, .z4-m, .z5-m, .z6-m, .z7-m, .z8-m, .z9-m, .z10-m, .z11-m
Large (-l):   .z1-l, .z2-l, .z3-l, .z4-l, .z5-l, .z6-l, .z7-l, .z8-l, .z9-l, .z10-l, .z11-l

Total: 44 classes.

## Examples

A basic stacking context:

```html
<div class="z1">Background layer</div>
<div class="z5">Content layer</div>
<div class="z10">Overlay layer</div>
<div class="z11">Modal / highest priority</div>
```

Responsive z-index â€” low on small screens, elevated on larger screens:

```html
<div class="z1 z5-m z8-l">Elevates as viewport grows</div>
```

## Source CSS

```css
.z1  { z-index: 1; }
.z2  { z-index: 100; }
.z3  { z-index: 200; }
.z4  { z-index: 300; }
.z5  { z-index: 400; }
.z6  { z-index: 500; }
.z7  { z-index: 600; }
.z8  { z-index: 700; }
.z9  { z-index: 800; }
.z10  { z-index: 900; }
.z11  { z-index: 2147483647; }

@media screen and (min-width: 32em) {
  .z1-s  { z-index: 1; }
  .z2-s  { z-index: 100; }
  .z3-s  { z-index: 200; }
  .z4-s  { z-index: 300; }
  .z5-s  { z-index: 400; }
  .z6-s  { z-index: 500; }
  .z7-s  { z-index: 600; }
  .z8-s  { z-index: 700; }
  .z9-s  { z-index: 800; }
  .z10-s  { z-index: 900; }
  .z11-s  { z-index: 2147483647; }
}

@media screen and (min-width: 48em) {
  .z1-m  { z-index: 1; }
  .z2-m  { z-index: 100; }
  .z3-m  { z-index: 200; }
  .z4-m  { z-index: 300; }
  .z5-m  { z-index: 400; }
  .z6-m  { z-index: 500; }
  .z7-m  { z-index: 600; }
  .z8-m  { z-index: 700; }
  .z9-m  { z-index: 800; }
  .z10-m  { z-index: 900; }
  .z11-m  { z-index: 2147483647; }
}

@media screen and (min-width: 96em) {
  .z1-l  { z-index: 1; }
  .z2-l  { z-index: 100; }
  .z3-l  { z-index: 200; }
  .z4-l  { z-index: 300; }
  .z5-l  { z-index: 400; }
  .z6-l  { z-index: 500; }
  .z7-l  { z-index: 600; }
  .z8-l  { z-index: 700; }
  .z9-l  { z-index: 800; }
  .z10-l  { z-index: 900; }
  .z11-l  { z-index: 2147483647; }
}
```
